thread.title: Power disrupted near Portage la Prairie, Man., after trailer comes off truck, rolls into hydro pole
thread.title_full: Power disrupted near Portage la Prairie, Man., after trailer comes off truck, rolls into hydro pole

author: cbc
title: Power disrupted near Portage la Prairie, Man., after trailer comes off truck, rolls into hydro pole
text:
Power was briefly knocked out near Portage la Prairie, Man., Friday night when a trailer became dislodged from the semi that was towing it and hit a hydro pole near the junction of Highway 16 and the Trans-Canada Highway.
A semi-trailer was towing two trailers around 11 p.m. when one of the trailers became disconnected, rolling over into the ditch and knocking the hydro pole as it went, an RCMP spokesperson confirmed Saturday.
The collision affected power in the immediate area, the spokesperson said.
Westbound Highway 1 was shut down for a few hours as crews restored power, he added.
There were no injuries.
The investigation is ongoing.
Highway 1 West was closed for a few hours as crews restored power. (Portage Online)
With files from Kelly Malone
